item.title: Ultimate Blog Setup
item.description:
Why Hugo + Obsidian

I have been wanting to create a blog for a long time and i even started using free WordPress but i knew that is not a solution i want.

I had heard of Hugo before from Axel Bock. I interacted with him on linked in after finding his Hugo blog. I didn’t know what Hugo is or how am I supposed to use it. I remembered my blog from my teenager days and i really didn’t like it. I also tried Blogger and WordPress. they are very limiting. It is very limiting that I have to do all the writing and editing in the website and even then that is not fun to do because you don’t get much freedom in making what you like.
